settings.custom_liquid:
The Beginning of Something Special

Velura was created out of a deep love for babies and a commitment to providing them with the safest, most gentle care. Seeing parents struggle to find truly natural baby products inspired us to make a difference. We believed there was a better way—one that combined the purity of nature with the expertise of pediatric care to nurture delicate skin in the best possible way.

From Home Lab to Trusted Brand

What started as a small-scale endeavour in Dr. J.K. Pushkar’s home lab has become a trusted name in baby care. Every product is carefully crafted with natural ingredients, chosen for their safety and effectiveness. Velura’s journey is a testament to the dedication of a paediatrician who combined medical expertise with a genuine love for children. Each formula is created to nurture and protect, making every parent feel confident in the choices they make for their little ones.

Nature’s Best for Baby’s Skin

At the heart of Velura is a commitment to using only the purest natural ingredients. From soothing botanical extracts to nourishing oils, every component is picked to provide gentle, effective care. Velura’s products are dermatologically tested and free from harmful chemicals, being true to safety and sustainability. Our products offer every baby the best nature has to offer, wrapped in a touch of loving care.

A Future of Compassionate Innovation

Looking ahead, we are excited about the future. As Velura continues to evolve, we remain true to our founding principles. We are dedicated to innovation, sustainability, and community support. Our goal is to be a driving force in the baby care industry, offering parents the safest, most effective, and most natural products available.

settings.heading: Our Mission
settings.text: Velura is a pediatrician-founded baby care brand dedicated to prioritizing your child’s health and wellness. We believe that every baby deserves the purest and gentlest care, which is why our mission is to offer a range of products crafted with natural ingredients and scientifically formulated to nourish, protect, and soothe your little one's delicate skin. Each product reflects our commitment to children's wellbeing, providing parents with peace of mind with every use.

settings.heading: Our Story
settings.text:
The inspiration for Velura arose from a profound realization by our founder, Dr. J.K. Pushkar, a dedicated pediatrician with over 15 years of experience. Witnessing the difficulties parents faced in finding truly safe and natural baby care products, Dr. Pushkar embarked on a mission to create a solution. Combining medical expertise with a deep passion for child health, Dr. Pushkar developed a line of baby care essentials that prioritize safety, effectiveness, and the nurturing touch of nature.

From its humble beginnings in Dr. Pushkar’s home lab, Velura has grown into a trusted name among discerning parents nationwide. Our journey has been driven by a steadfast commitment to providing the best for your baby. Our pediatrician-led team meticulously selects each ingredient to ensure it is natural, safe, and beneficial for delicate skin.

settings.heading: Our Products
settings.text:
Velura's Manuka Range: Premier Baby Care in India

At Velura, we’ve meticulously crafted a suite of baby care essentials to cater to every aspect of your baby’s skin and wellness. We proudly introduce Manuka honey, sourced from Australia and New Zealand, into our products for the first time in India. Known for its skin benefits, Manuka honey offers:

  • Antibacterial Protection: Shields skin from bacteria.
  • Cell Regeneration: Supports tissue repair.
  • Anti-Inflammatory Action: Reduces pain and inflammation.
  • Methylglyoxal (MGO): Provides potent antibacterial effects.

Our Product Line Includes:

  • Baby Massage Oil: Nourishes and moisturizes, enhancing relaxation and bonding.
  • Baby Body Wash: Gently cleanses while preserving natural moisture, perfect for daily use.
  • Baby Moisturizing Lotion: Keeps skin soft and hydrated all day.
  • Tummy Roll-On: Soothes gas and colic discomfort.
  • Baby Bathing Bar:Cleanses delicately without harsh chemicals, ensuring a gentle bath.
  • Diaper Rash Cream: Prevents and treats diaper rash with a protective barrier.

Each product blends the power of nature with pediatric expertise for safe, effective care of your baby’s delicate skin.

settings.heading: Why Us
settings.text:
Choosing Velura means entrusting your baby’s care to a team of pediatricians who deeply understand the unique needs of your baby’s skin. Here’s why our brand stands out:

  • Pediatrician-Owned and Led: Our products are crafted with a profound understanding of child health, ensuring they adhere to the highest standards of safety and efficacy.
  • Focus on Natural Ingredients: We harness the power of nature. Our formulations use natural, non-toxic ingredients that are both gentle and effective.
  • Commitment to Safety and Effectiveness: Our dedication to your baby’s wellbeing is evident in our rigorous quality control processes, guaranteeing that each product is safe and beneficial.
  • Proven Success: The growing community of satisfied parents and glowing testimonials reflect the positive impact our products have on babies' health and happiness.

At Velura, we’re more than just a baby care brand; we’re a trusted partner in your child’s wellness journey, providing products you can rely on to care for your baby with the same gentleness and love you do.

settings.heading: Our commitment to quality and safety
settings.text:
At Velura, the health and safety of your baby are our top priorities. We understand that you seek only the best for your little ones, which is why we are dedicated to ensuring the quality and safety of our products. Here’s how we uphold our commitment:

  • Rigorous Ingredient Selection: Each ingredient in our products is meticulously chosen for its purity and effectiveness. We strictly avoid harmful chemicals and additives, ensuring that only the safest ingredients come into contact with your baby’s skin.
  • Pediatrician-Formulated: Our products are formulated by pediatricians, not just endorsed by them. This approach allows us to apply expert medical knowledge to create products specifically designed to meet the needs of baby skin and health.
  • Stringent Quality Control: We adhere to the highest standards of quality control throughout our production process. Our facilities follow strict guidelines to ensure that every batch of our products meets our rigorous standards.
  • Transparency: We believe in complete transparency regarding our ingredients and processes. Parents deserve to know exactly what is applied to their baby's skin, and we provide all necessary information to support informed choices.
  • Certifications and Approvals: Where applicable, our products undergo thorough testing and certification to meet and exceed both national and international safety standards.

We are committed to complying with all regulatory requirements to ensure that our products are not only effective but also safe for your baby.

settings.heading: Future Vision
settings.text:
Looking ahead, Velura is dedicated to driving innovation, sustainability, and community support. Our goals include:

  • Innovative Product Development: We are committed to continuous research and the development of new formulations to meet a broader range of baby care needs, always emphasizing natural ingredients and pediatric expertise.
  • Sustainability: We strive to minimize our environmental impact through eco-friendly ingredient sourcing and sustainable packaging solutions. Our commitment extends to caring for our planet for the benefit of future generations.
  • Community Engagement: Our support for families goes beyond providing products. We actively engage with communities through educational initiatives, partnerships, and programs that promote child health and wellness.
  • Ethical Sourcing: We ensure that our commitment to natural ingredients is matched by responsible sourcing practices. Our ingredients are ethically obtained, supporting fair trade and environmental stewardship.

At Velura, we are dedicated to these principles as we work towards a healthier, more sustainable future for families and our planet.

settings.heading: Call To Action
settings.text:
Discover the gentle, effective care your baby deserves with Velura. Explore our range of natural baby care products, crafted with love and pediatric expertise. Join our community of satisfied parents and healthy babies today.

For more information, visit our website, follow us on social media, or contact us directly. Your baby’s wellness journey begins here. With Velura, you’re choosing more than just baby care products; you’re choosing a brand that embodies safety, quality, and the unwavering commitment of a pediatrician to children’s wellbeing.
